education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science with Honours

summary.title: Career Profile
summary.text: Consultant and former development manager with 14 yearsâ€™ experience developing web and server applications for multiple industries. Currently focused on delivering bespoke solutions leveraging microservices, serverless architectures. Interested in opportunities to provide technical and process leadership to your development organisations.

jobs.summary: Azenix is a consultancy under the Mantel Group providing .NET & Azure services.
details: Implemented event-driven serverless applications for multiple customers
Managed infrastructure-as-code delivery for multiple applications

jobs.summary: InfoTrack is a market leader in providing search and workflow services to the legal industry. InfoTrack provides a single platform for E-Conveyancing, due diligence, and more; tightly integrated into multiple practice management software solutions.
details: Assisted with design and management of InfoTrack's global software platform
Transitioned from a monolithic .NET 4.5 platform into multiple containerised microservices
Initiated a migration from Teamcity to Azurte DevOps with builds managed as code
Adopted Identity Server 4 to create a centralised login experience
Implemented the vision of a shared software platform across three countries
Managed the development of the core platform and infrastructure used to generate more than $1.5 million/week
Managed and mentored multiple developers
Migrated hosting from private cloud to AWS and assisted with the adoption of AWS managed services
Managed the replacement of synchronous systems with an event driven architecture backed by MassTransit and AmazonMQ
Released new corporate product offerings integrated with ASIC written with Knockout JS and .NET MVC
Implemented MongoDB document storage for existing XML archives
Implemented new CI/CD processes and infrastructure worldwide using TeamCity and Octopus Deploy

jobs.summary: BlueSun is a small Canadian company that specialises in providing web software for the life insurance and mutual fund industries via their WealthServ products.
details: Developed new products using C#, Java, JavaScript, MVC, & SQL Server
Managed the WealthServ Insurance product as the lead developer
Triaged all issues related to the WealthServ Insurance platform
Converted client data for new client installations
Led the product support team
Supported the sales process for prospective clients

jobs.summary: EA Canada is responsible for the development of multiple major sports video game franchises released yearly.
details: Employed as part of a work placement through the University of Waterloo
Assisted in the development of FIFA 10 on Xbox 360 & PS3
Implemented tool support code in C# and C++/CLI
Developed runtime code in C++ for character animations

jobs.summary: Atlantis Cyberspace is a small American company based in Hawaii that develops training software for the US armed forces.
details: Developed database interface layer for Unreal 3 based simulation software
Produced a web portal using ASP.NET web forms for commanding officers to receive real-time reports of simulation participants
Implemented remoting methods for a server/client architecture
Implemented C++/CLI and C# interfaces for game engine access
